strings.str: You deposit tax document can be used to claim VAT deduction for the deposit received.
VAT liability is payable by the recipient of our services. Pursuant to section 10 of Value Added tax act, the place of taxable supply is abroad
We have issued an invoice for the services provided according to the Cooperation Contract for Domain Name Registration
We are charging you a contractual fine according to the Article 4.3.1 of the Business Conditions for Registrars included in the Cooperation Contract for Domain Name Registration
We are charging you an annual fee for the connection to the Central Registry
VAT has been settled through deposit tax documents

str.name: maintained by the Municipal Court in Prague, File ref.: L 58624.

strings.str: maintained by the Municipal Court in Prague, File ref.: L 58624.
Prolonging the registration of .cz domain names

str.name: The CZ.NIC z. s. p. o. company, an administrator...

strings.str: The association CZ.NIC, z. s. p. o., administrator of the top level .CZ domain, hereby informs you that your registrar has not yet submitted a request to prolong the validity of domain names listed in the attachment to this letter. These domain names are currently out of operation (please refer to Rules for Registering Domain Names in the ccTLD .cz at www.nic.cz).

str.name: Should you be interested in keeping this domain name...

strings.str: Should you still be interested in these domain names, please contact your assigned registrar urgently and agree on how to proceed. You can also choose another registrar and entrust them with prolonging your registration. An up-to-date list of companies which are accredited registrars can also be found at www.nic.cz.
Please notice than unless the registration of the domain names is prolonged by the deadline, they will be cancelled on
and made available for other interested subjects.
The date of registration cancellation cannot be changed.
Attachment – list of domain names and their assigned registrars

The association CZ.NIC, z. s. p. o., administrator of the top level .CZ domain, hereby informs you that your registrar has not yet submitted a request to prolong the validity of domain names listed in the attachment to this letter. These domain names are currently out of operation (please refer to Rules for Registering Domain Names in the ccTLD .cz at www.nic.cz).
Should you still be interested in these domain names,
please contact your assigned registrar urgently

and agree on how to proceed. You can also choose another registrar and entrust them with prolonging your registration. An up-to-date list of companies which are accredited registrars can also be found at www.nic.cz.
unless the registration of the domain names is prolonged by the deadline, they will be cancelled on
and made available for other interested subjects.

str.name: Operations manager, CZ.NIC, z. s. p. o.

strings.str: Operations manager, CZ.NIC, z. s. p. o.
Subject: Notice re non-functional email in the records of the .cz domain name registry
Make the change via your registrar
The CZ.NIC Association, the manager of the TLD .cz domain found out that the data in the contact
might not be correct or up-to-date.
Due to the fact that this condition is contrary to the Rules of Domain Names Registration under ccTLD .cz, we would like to ask you
to correct or provide evidence of data accuracy of the above mentioned contact within a period of 15 days of receiving this notice, no later than
In case you do not follow this rule, the CZ.NIC Association may use its right according to the Article 16.1.2 of the Rules of Domain Names Registration under ccTLD .cz and
cancel the registration of those domain names where the contact
is listed as a domain holder.
We confirm the change in the contact above. Registration of domain names, for which the contact
is listed as the holder, remains unchanged.
